name: Rishikesh
description: Famous for its river rafting, yoga ashrams, and the Ganga ghats, Rishikesh is vibrant and spiritual.

name: Hampi
description: A UNESCO heritage site with ancient ruins, temples, and boulder-strewn landscapes, ideal for budget exploration.

name: Darjeeling
description: Known for tea gardens, mountain views and the iconic toy train; perfect for scenic walks and affordable stays.

name: Mcleodganj
description: Nestled in Himachal, Mcleodganj is a Tibetan cultural center with beautiful treks and monasteries.

name: Udaipur
description: The romantic lake city with palaces, affordable boat rides, and cheap, delicious street food.

name: Varanasi
description: The spiritual heart of India, famous for ghats, temples, and mesmerizing Ganga Aarti.

name: Goa
description: Indiaâ€™s party destination, also known for its affordable hostels and beaches perfect for a budget trip.

name: Shimla
description: Picturesque hill station with colonial charm, Mall Road strolls, and pocket-friendly hotels.

name: Kodaikanal
description: The 'Princess of Hill Stations' in Tamil Nadu with lakes, waterfalls, and low-cost guesthouses.

name: Pushkar
description: Home to the famous Brahma temple and colourful markets, with easily available budget lodging.

name: Kanyakumari
description: The southern tip of India: see the confluence of seas and visit temples on a tight budget.

name: Pondicherry
description: Experience French colonial charm, clean beaches, and budget-friendly cafes in this union territory.

name: Khajuraho
description: Known for UNESCO-listed Hindu and Jain temples, with affordable hotels and a calm village vibe.
